import React from 'react' import Products from '../products' import { Row,Col,Button,Image,ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Ratings from './Ratings' import products from '../products' const ProductDetails = ({match}) => { const product=Products[match.params.id-1] console.log(product); return (

{product.title}

{product.description}
) } export default ProductDetails
